headline.main: HOUSE VOTE BY STATES ON ENDING SHIP BANS; Majority of Delegations From 28 States Recorded for Bill

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 14 (U.P.) -- On the basis of yesterday's vote in the House of 212 to 194 to permit American merchant ships to enter War zones, President Roosevelt's foreign policy was endorsed by members from twenty-eight of the forty-eight States, with the South leading.
